name: Cutiee Didi
greetingText: I'm lucky to have met the most beautiful person like you.
wishText: May your cheeks stay fresh like the flowers on your head, and your smile always bloom like flowers. Wishing you everlasting happiness.
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday! May joy,smiles and me always stay with youâ€¦
text2: I want you to feel excited halaki gussa tha mai
text3: I thought about this very carefully.
text4: I realized I needed to do something
text4Adjective: special kya hua agar aap ignore kr rhe ho to
text5Content: you are one of the most special person to me.
replayText: If you liked it, you can watch it again by simply clicking here...
